description: Try our easy to follow Cannellini Wrap + Snacks recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Kids wrap,Pescatarian,Halal,Vegetarian,Apple,Tree nut free,Back to school,Spinach,Budget,Peanut free
name: Cannellini Wrap + Snacks Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.2 red capsicum, thinly sliced (for cannellini bean wrap)
0.5 cup cannellini beans (for cannellini bean wrap)
40g cheese block, sliced (for crackers & cheese snack)
10g baby spinach leaves (for cannellini bean wrap)
1 large free range egg (for oat & honey cookies)
6 brown rice crackers no salt (for crackers & cheese snack)

recipeInstructions.text: Cannellini bean wrap. Mash beans with avocado and spread over wrap. Top with baby spinach leaves and capsicum. Roll to enclose.
Part 2: Oat & honey cookies. Preheat oven to 180oC. Line a baking tray with baking paper. Place oats in a food processor and process until finely chopped, keeping a little texture.
Whisk the egg and honey in a medium bowl. Stir in oats and sultanas until well combined.
Roll rounded tablespoons of the mixture into 12 balls and place on prepared tray. Using a fork, flatten slightly. Bake for 10-12 minutes or until golden and crisp. Set aside to cool completely.
Wrap 2 cookies in plastic wrap and place in lunch box.
Store leftover cookies in an airtight container for up to 3 days. To freeze, wrap individually in plastic wrap and freeze for up to 1 month. Crackers and cheese snack: Pack separately in lunch box.
